summary: This is an email chain from August 2019 regarding internal Bureau of Prisons inquiries about staffing data, specifically AWOL figures, augmentations, and overtime at MCC New York and MDC Brooklyn, prompted by a request from an unspecified high-level official ('Acting Director'). The tone suggests urgency and concern about providing accurate information.

events.title: Urgent Request for Staffing Data
events.description: An urgent request is made for specific staffing data (AWOL figures, augmentations, overtime) from MCC New York and MDC Brooklyn to be provided to an unnamed official and the Acting Director before noon.

events.title: Data Verification and Response
events.description: A responder indicates they are verifying AWOL data, noting all AWOLs were full 8-hour shifts, but expresses hesitation about sending potentially inaccurate information.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain dated August 13-14, 2019, concerning Bureau of Prisons staffing.
There was an urgent request for detailed data on AWOLs, augmentations, and overtime at MCC New York and MDC Brooklyn for the week of August 4-10, 2019.
The request was to be delivered to an unnamed official and the 'Acting Director' before a deadline, indicating high-level interest.
A responder was verifying that all AWOLs were full 8-hour shifts but was concerned about sending inaccurate information.
The document references standard BOP procedures for overtime sign-up and data tracking in the NFC system.
